title: Foresters
action01: Move 2. move cost forest, hills, swamp reduced by 1

title: Illusionists
action02: Target unfortified enemy does not attack

title: Utem Guardsmen
action02: Block 4. counts twice against swiftness attack

title: Utem Swordsmen
action02: Attack or Block 6. This Unit becomes wounded

title: Fire Mages
action03: Gain a red mana token and a red crystal to your Inventory.

title: Ice Mages
action03: Gain a blue mana token and a blue crystal to your Inventory.

title: Amotep Freezers
action02: Target enemy does not attack this combat and it gets Armor -3 (to a minimum of 1).

title: Altem Mages
action01: Gain 2 mana tokens of any colors
action02: Cold Fire attack or Cold Fire Block 5. You can pay a blue or red mana to increase this to 7, or pay both to increase this to 9.
action03: Pay a black mana.  All attacks you play this combat become Cold Fire Attacks.

title: Altem Guardians
action02: Block 8. Counts twice against an attack with Swiftness.
action03: Pay a green mana: All units you control gain all resistances this turn.
